mapper.select: select * from (select rownum r, N.* from (select * from event where to_date(e_date, 'YY-MM-DD')>= to_date(sysdate,'YY-MM-DD') order by num desc) N) where r between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
select * from (select rownum r, N.* from (select * from event where to_date(e_date, 'YY-MM-DD') < to_date(sysdate,'YY-MM-DD') order by num desc) N) where r between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
select count(num) from event where to_date(e_date, 'YY-MM-DD')>= to_date(sysdate,'YY-MM-DD')
select count(num) from event where to_date(e_date, 'YY-MM-DD') < to_date(sysdate,'YY-MM-DD')
mapper.update: update event set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
